title: Bro.Guru
author: Bro.Guru
content: Dear friends,My name is Walter, and I am pleased to present to your attention a fast, profitable, and even with 24/7 support, the latest generation exchange service BRO.GURU.My team has been working in the field of exchanging, buying and selling electronic currencies and cryptocurrencies for many years, so I can say with confidence that the experience of working with us will not disappoint you.So, by choosing our service, you get the minimum processing time for an order (from 5 to 20 minutes), competent and 24/7 control by service operators, current exchange directions and minimal commissions.We will be happy to answer your questions by email and online chat.Site: https://bro.guru/E-mail: hi@bro.guru

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: I don't see your exchanger profile listed anywhere on BestChange. Are you in the process of getting listed there?

comments.author: Rikafip
comments.body: Quote from: Bitcoin_Arena on August 19, 2023, 11:57:15 PMI don't see your exchanger profile listed anywhere on BestChange. Are you in the process of getting listed there?I found them on BestChange website, but they don't have any reviews so I would be very careful when dealing with them. Also, their "reserve" number  ($195M) seems grossly overexagarrated, compared to some of the most popular exchangers on BestChange.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: I find exchange bit poor in terms of UX (no quick flip, minimum amount doesn't reflect instaneously, mobile site doesn't show 'receiving side at all — in desktop mode it's fine). Customer support was quick tho, I asked query about minimum amount being ~2K USD (no discrimination involved, all coins same Polygon/TRX too, which was surprising to me) and they answered promptly, it's their policy. I see no reason to use yours in myriad of others. Good luck!
